籤詩版本二:
Pamene mayendedwe a chess a mdani ali oyenera, masewera akuda ndi oyera samasankhidwa.
Tonse timadziwa kupambana kapena kugonja chifukwa cha kusuntha kumodzi, tiyenera kudziphunzitsa tokha kupanga malingaliro abwino.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro chokumana ndi mdani.
Ndi bwino kugwiritsa ntchito ziwalo zonse.
解曰: Zofuna ndi malingaliro. Monga Go. Chigonjetso pamapeto. Ndikoyenera kugwiritsa ntchito ziwembu.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Gulu lankhondo la Jiang Wei ndi Deng Ai
Munthawi ya Maufumu Atatu, Jiang Wei (Shu) ndi Deng Ai (Wei)
Asilikali awiriwa adakumana ku Qishan ndipo adamenyana wina ndi mnzake. Asilikali onse ankhondo a Wei ndi a Shu anayang’anizana ndi adaniwo m’gulu la Bagua.” Pamene magulu ankhondo aŵiriwo anali kumenyana, Jiang Wei anagwedeza mbendera yake ndi kufuula, ndipo mapangidwe a Bagua nthawi yomweyo anasandulika kukhala malo aatali okhotakhota njoka, akumakola Deng Ai. Pambuyo pake adapulumutsidwa ndi Sima Wang.
(Mwachifanizo, mukakumana ndi vuto lalikulu, muyenera kugwiritsa ntchito nzeru.)
聖意: Banja ndi nyumba ndi zokhazikika, zokhazikika, bizinesi ikuyenda bwino, ukwati suyanjanitsidwa, mkazi woyenda pansi ku Liujia amatchinga munda, mphutsi za silika ndi ziweto zikuwonongeka, kufufuza kumaletsedwa, mlandu ndi woyenera komanso kusamuka. nzosamalitsa, chuma chotayika chilibe kanthu, nthendayo imapempherera chitetezo, manda a m’mapiri ndi osasunga
古人: Jiang Wei ndi Deng Ai akumenya nkhondo
第X籤: Lotale yopambana makumi anayi ndi anayi
